pre_caption: This is a wide, low-angle scenery shot of a poolside at night. The pool occupies the foreground and the bottom half of the frame. In the middle ground, the pool's edge runs horizontally across the center. A house is visible in the background, positioned in the left and center of the frame, with palm trees silhouetted behind it across the top. Initially, a single jet of water arcs from the left-center middle ground into the foreground pool. A second jet then appears to its left, followed by a third, larger jet that enters from the right side of the frame, also arcing into the pool. The camera remains static throughout the shot.
